meanings.definition: To scatter or sprinkle over or on something.
meanings.sent1: I besprinkle sugar on my cereal every morning.
meanings.sent2: She likes to besprinkle glitter on her artwork.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous fairy decided to besprinkle the garden with magic dust.
meanings.sent4: The chef's creativity knew no bounds as he would besprinkle edible flowers on his dishes.
meanings.sent5: The gentle rain began to besprinkle the parched earth, bringing much-needed relief.

meanings.sent1: The baker would besprinkle powdered sugar on the freshly baked donuts.
meanings.sent2: He would besprinkle the salad with a dash of lemon juice.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they tried to besprinkle each other with confetti.
meanings.sent4: The artist would besprinkle his paintings with tiny specks of gold leaf.
meanings.sent5: The magician would besprinkle his hat with glitter before pulling out a rabbit.
